message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to your business. Given its potential, I'm initially offering it for $1,150,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $1,050,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I believe the true value of this product is significantly higher. I could come down to $1,100,000.  This is my final offer.
I've considered your latest offer, Alice, but I still feel that $1,050,000 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can agree on this amount.
